title: 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor Iron Frame Mirrors Art Round Home Hanging Mirrors for Living Room/Bedroom/Bathroom/Entryway (Medium Size 15.7 inch)
descriptions:
**Advertising Description:**

Transform your living space into a work of art with our 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor! This modern, artistic home decor set features a stunning design of circles within circles that is sure to captivate and inspire. Each mirror in the set boasts a mirror diameter of 10 inches, framed in a sleek, gold-toned iron frame measuring 15.7 inches in diameter.

The mirrors are not only visually appealing but also functional. The high quality annealed glass provides HD imaging to prevent warping and distortion, ensuring a clear reflection every time. Weighing just 2lb each, these mirrors are easy to hang with one screw, making installation a breeze.

Our Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor is versatile and suitable for various decor styles. Whether you're looking to enhance your living room, bedroom, bathroom, entryway, or office space, this set will perfectly complement the existing décor. Why not create a stunning gallery wall with other wall art such as paintings, sculptures, or candle sconces? The possibilities are endless!

Boasting an attractive gold finish between matte and bright, these mirrors add an elegant touch to any room. Packaged decently for safe delivery, each mirror comes ready to be admired in your home. Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity to elevate your interior design game with our 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor!
